Sign Up for FLL Explore Expo
FLL Explore Expo

FLL Explore Expo

Date: May 4, 2025

Time: 2:00 PM - 4:00 PM

Location: 2172, Ivy Road, Charlottesville VA

🌊🤖 Join Us for Our First-Ever Competition! 🤖🌊
We’re excited to host our first local competition to give younger students a chance to explore STEM and dive into the world of FIRST! 🚀
🏆 Competition & Judging
Teams will showcase ocean-themed projects, judged by STEM professionals on:
✔ Creativity 🎨
✔ Technical skills 🔧
✔ Teamwork 👯‍♂️
✔ Presentation 🎤
Awards will recognize outstanding innovation, problem-solving, and collaboration! 🏅
🤯 See What’s Next in FIRST!
Check out live demos of other FIRST programs like:
FIRST LEGO League Challenge 🏗️
FIRST Tech Challenge 🔩
FIRST Robotics Competition 🚀
🎉 Come Celebrate!
Join us in cheering on these amazing teams and discovering the exciting world of FIRST! 🌍🐙
